content.name: updateElement
content.text: Accessor to update an element in the opened model

syntax.doc: an xml resource with a valid (uniquely identified) element

section.name: purpose
section.content:
The updateElement accessor validate the updated element against its schema, deletes the element with the same id as the update element (the prior version), if any, and then the updated element in the currently opened model.
If successful the response is a boolean indicating if a prior version was removed, otherwise an exception is thrown.
Validation The schema attribute value in the updated element is used to validate it. If the validation fails, an exception is raised. The schemas are located under /resources/schemas and must be in RelaxNG's XML format.
